verses.text: It is \w reported|strong="G0191"\w* \w commonly|strong="G3654"\w* \add that there is\add* \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w* as \w is|strong="G3748"\w* not so much \w as|strong="G3761"\w* \w named|strong="G3687"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* should \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w his|strong="G3588"\w* \w fatherâ€™s|strong="G3962"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G2075"\w* puffed \w up|strong="G5448"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G3996"\w* \w not|strong="G3780"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* \w mourned|strong="G3996"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he that hath \w done|strong="G4160"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w deed|strong="G2041"\w* might be taken \w away|strong="G1808"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w among|strong="G3319"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w verily|strong="G3303"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w absent|strong="G0548"\w* in \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w present|strong="G3918"\w* in \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, have \w judged|strong="G2919"\w* \w already|strong="G2235"\w*, as \w though|strong="G5613"\w* I were \w present|strong="G3918"\w*, \add concerning\add* him \w that|strong="G3588"\w* hath \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w done|strong="G2716"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w deed|strong="G2716"\w*,

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w when|strong="G4863"\w* \w ye|strong="G5216"\w* are gathered \w together|strong="G4863"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w my|strong="G1700"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w with|strong="G4862"\w* the \w power|strong="G1411"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*,

To \w deliver|strong="G3860"\w* such an \w one|strong="G5108"\w* unto \w Satan|strong="G4567"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* the \w destruction|strong="G3639"\w* of the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* may be \w saved|strong="G4982"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w Your|strong="G5216"\w* \w glorying|strong="G2745"\w* \add is\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w*. Know \w ye|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* a \w little|strong="G3398"\w* \w leaven|strong="G2219"\w* \w leaveneth|strong="G2220"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w lump|strong="G5445"\w*?

Purge \w out|strong="G1571"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* the \w old|strong="G3820"\w* \w leaven|strong="G2219"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye may \w be|strong="G5600"\w* a \w new|strong="G3501"\w* \w lump|strong="G5445"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* ye \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w unleavened|strong="G0106"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w passover|strong="G3957"\w* is \w sacrificed|strong="G2380"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*:

\w Therefore|strong="G5620"\w* let us keep the \w feast|strong="G1858"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w old|strong="G3820"\w* \w leaven|strong="G2219"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3366"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* the \w leaven|strong="G2219"\w* of \w malice|strong="G2549"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wickedness|strong="G4189"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* the \w unleavened|strong="G0106"\w* \add bread\add* of \w sincerity|strong="G1505"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*.

I \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* an \w epistle|strong="G1992"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* to \w company|strong="G4874"\w* with \w fornicators|strong="G4205"\w*:

\w Yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w altogether|strong="G3843"\w* with the \w fornicators|strong="G4205"\w* of \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* with the \w covetous|strong="G4123"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w extortioners|strong="G0727"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* with \w idolaters|strong="G1496"\w*; \w for|strong="G1893"\w* \w then|strong="G0686"\w* must ye \w needs|strong="G3784"\w* go \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3570"\w* I have \w written|strong="G1125"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* to keep \w company|strong="G4874"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* that is \w called|strong="G3687"\w* a \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* a \w fornicator|strong="G4205"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w covetous|strong="G4123"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* an \w idolater|strong="G1496"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* a \w railer|strong="G3060"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* a \w drunkard|strong="G3183"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* an \w extortioner|strong="G0727"\w*; with such an \w one|strong="G5108"\w* no \w not|strong="G3366"\w* to \w eat|strong="G4906"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* have \w I|strong="G3427"\w* to do to \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* that \w are|strong="G2532"\w* \w without|strong="G1854"\w*? \w do|strong="G2919"\w* \w not|strong="G3780"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* them that \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w within|strong="G2080"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* them that \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w without|strong="G1854"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w judgeth|strong="G2919"\w*. \w Therefore|strong="G2532"\w* put \w away|strong="G1808"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* among \w yourselves|strong="G5216"\w* \w that|strong="G0846"\w* wicked \w person|strong="G4190"\w*.
